name: Enigma (itch) (Tõnu)
description:
How to play:

Use numbers 0-9 on your keyboard to enter a number to highlighted box.
There are 3 boxes in a column and total of 5 rows.

Enter 3 numbers then those numbers will be validated.

Green means that the number is correct and is in correct position.
Yellow means that the number is correct but in wrong position.
Red means that the number is wrong.

Get all 3 numbers correct and you have cracked the code.


Sound Effect from:  https://pixabay.com
Font from: https://www.1001freefonts.com/bitwise.font

Game made for Trijam 205,  in about 2h 40min.
Game made by Tõnu
